Name: tauvpbl
Title: Northward Surface Stress from Planetary Boundary Layer Scheme
Description: The  downward northward stress associated with the models parameterization of the planetary boundary layer. (This request is related to a WGNE effort to understand how models parameterize the surface stresses.)

Name: rsutcso3ref
Title: Top of atmosphere shortwave radiative flux under clear sky conditions from a diagnostic call to the radiation scheme using a reference ozone field
Justification for inclusion: When used in combination with output from the prognostic call to the radiation scheme, it can be used to diagnose instantaneous radiative forcing by ozone

Name: demc
Title: Convective Cloud Emissivity
Description: This is the in-cloud emissivity obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell.

Name: o3loss
Title: O3 Destruction Rate
Description: ONLY provide the sum of the following reactions: (i) O(1D)+H2O; (ii) O3+HO2; (iii) O3+OH; (iv) O3+alkenes (isoprene, ethene,...)

Name: sfriver
Title: Salt Flux into Sea Water from Rivers
Description: This field is physical, and it arises when rivers carry a nonzero salt content.  Often this is zero, with rivers assumed to be fresh.

Name: sblIs
Title: Ice Sheet Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
Description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass per unit area from the surface resulting from their direct conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.

Name: swsrfasdust
Title: All-Sky Surface Shortwave Radiative Flux Due to Dust
Description: The direct radiative effect refers to the instantaneous radiative impact on the Earth's energy balance, excluding secondary effects such as changes in cloud cover.

Name: swtoacsdust
Title: Clear Sky Shortwave Flux Due to Dust at Toa
Description: Instantaneous forcing is the radiative flux change caused instantaneously by an imposed change in radiative forcing agent (greenhouse gases, aerosol, solar radiation, etc.).

Name: limndiaz
Title: Nitrogen Limitation of Diazotrophs
Description: In ocean modelling, diazotrophs are phytoplankton of the phylum cyanobacteria distinct from other phytoplankton groups in their ability to fix nitrogen gas in addition to nitrate and ammonium. Phytoplankton are algae that grow where there is sufficient light to support photosynthesis. "Nitrogen growth limitation" means the ratio of the growth rate of a species population in the environment (where there is a finite availability of nitrogen) to the theoretical growth rate if there were no such limit on nitrogen availability.

Name: wbgt2m
Title: mean 2m daily wet bulb globe temperature
Justification for inclusion: Important for the estimation of heat stress on human health

Name: dcw
Title: Change in Interception Storage
Description: The phrase "change\_over\_time\_in\_X" means change in a quantity X over a time-interval, which should be defined by the bounds of the time coordinate. "Canopy" means the plant or vegetation canopy. Canopy water is the water on the canopy. "Water" means water in all phases, including frozen, i.e. ice and snow. "Amount" means mass per unit area.

Name: tdps
Title: 2m Dewpoint Temperature
Description: Dew point temperature is the temperature at which a parcel of air reaches saturation upon being cooled at constant pressure and specific humidity.

Name: tnhusscp
Title: Tendency of Specific Humidity Due to Stratiform Clouds and Precipitation
Description: The phrase "tendency\_of\_X" means derivative of X with respect to time. "Specific" means per unit mass. Specific humidity is the mass fraction of water vapor in (moist) air. The specification of a physical process by the phrase "due\_to\_" process means that the quantity named is a single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase. A variable with the standard name of tendency\_of\_specific\_humidity\_due\_to\_stratiform\_cloud\_and\_precipitation should contain the effects of all processes which convert stratiform clouds and precipitation to or from water vapor. In an atmosphere model, stratiform cloud is that produced by large-scale convergence (not the convection schemes).

Name: tsl
Title: Temperature of Soil
Description: Temperature of soil. Reported as missing for grid cells with no land.

Name: co2s
Title: Atmosphere CO2
Description: As co2, but only at the surface

Name: wsgmax100m
Title: Maximum Wind Speed of Gust at 100m
Description: Wind speed gust maximum at 100m above surface

Name: zg500
Title: Geopotential Height at 500hPa
Description: geopotential height on the 500 hPa surface

Name: detoc
Title: Detrital Organic Carbon Concentration
Description: Sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations

Name: landCoverFrac
Title: Percentage of Area by Vegetation or Land-Cover Category
Description: Percentage of grid cell area occupied by different model vegetation/land cover categories. The categories may differ from model to model, depending on each model's subgrid land cover category definitions. Categories may include natural vegetation, anthropogenic vegetation, bare soil, lakes, urban areas, glaciers, etc. Sum of all should equal the percentage of the grid cell that is land.

Name: fescav
Title: Non-Biogenic Iron Scavenging
Description: Dissolved Fe removed through nonbiogenic scavenging onto particles

Name: sossq
Title: Square of Sea Surface Salinity
Description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.

Name: tslsiLut
Title: Surface Temperature on Landuse Tile
Description: Surface temperature (i.e. temperature at which long-wave radiation emitted)

Name: rsdcsaf
Title: Downwelling Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Shortwave Radiation
Description: Calculated in the absence of aerosols and clouds (following Ghan). This requires a double-call in the radiation code with precisely the same meteorology.

Name: wetlandCH4prod
Title: Grid Averaged Methane Production (Methanogenesis) from Wetlands
Description: Biological emissions (methanogenesis) of methane (NH4) from wetlands (areas where water covers the soil, or is present either at or near the surface of the soil all year or for varying periods of time during the year, including during the growing season).

Name: abs550bc
Title: ambient black carbon aerosol absorption optical depth at 550nm
Justification for inclusion: To unravel reason for model spread in direct aerosol effect

Name: fLulccProductLut
Title: Carbon Harvested Due to Land-Use or Land-Cover Change Process That Enters Anthropogenic Product Pools on Tile
Description: This annual mean flux refers to the transfer of carbon primarily through harvesting land use into anthropogenic product pools, e.g.,deforestation or wood harvesting from primary or secondary lands, food harvesting on croplands, harvesting (grazing) by animals on pastures.

Name: nppLut
Title: Net Primary Production on Land-Use Tile as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: "Production of carbon" means the production of biomass expressed as the mass of carbon which it contains. Net primary production is the excess of gross primary production (rate of synthesis of biomass from inorganic precursors) by autotrophs ("producers"), for example, photosynthesis in plants or phytoplankton, over the rate at which the autotrophs themselves respire some of this biomass. "Productivity" means production per unit area. The phrase "expressed\_as" is used in the construction A\_expressed\_as\_B, where B is a chemical constituent of A. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A.

Name: gppLut
Title: Gross Primary Production on Land-Use Tile as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: The rate of synthesis of biomass from inorganic precursors by autotrophs ("producers") expressed as the mass of carbon which it contains. For example, photosynthesis in plants or phytoplankton. The producers also respire some of this biomass and the difference is referred to as the net primary production. Reported on land-use tiles.

Name: sisali
Title: Sea Ice Salinity
Description: Mean sea-ice salinity of all sea ice in grid cell

Name: hfrainds
Title: Temperature Flux Due to Rainfall Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
Description: This is defined as "where ice\_free\_sea over sea"; i.e., the total flux (considered here) entering the ice-free portion of the grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  All such heat fluxes are computed based on Celsius scale.

Name: sfpm25
Title: PM2.5 Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
Description: Mass fraction of atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 2.5 micrometers. To specify the relative humidity and temperature at which the particle size applies, provide scalar coordinate variables with the standard names of "relative\_humidity" and "air\_temperature".

Name: mrsow
Title: Total Soil Wetness
Description: Vertically integrated soil moisture divided by maximum allowable soil moisture above wilting point.

Name: c4h10
Title: Butane volume mixing ratio
Justification for inclusion: To understand VOC budgets

Name: mc
Title: Convective Mass Flux
Description: The net mass flux should represent the difference between the updraft and downdraft components.  The flux is computed as the mass divided by the area of the grid cell.

Name: reffgrpls
Title: Hydrometeor Effective Radius of Stratiform Graupel
Description: This is defined as the in-cloud ratio of the third moment over the second moment of the particle size distribution (obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell).

Name: sob
Title: Sea Water Salinity at Sea Floor
Description: Model prognostic salinity at bottom-most model grid cell

Name: cw
Title: Total Canopy Water Storage
Description: "Amount" means mass per unit area. "Water" means water in all phases, including frozen i.e. ice and snow. "Canopy" means the plant or vegetation canopy. The canopy water is the water on the canopy.

Name: clcalipso
Title: CALIPSO Percentage Cloud Cover
Description: Percentage cloud cover in CALIPSO standard atmospheric layers.

Name: abs550aer
Title: Ambient Aerosol Absorption Optical Thickness at 550nm
Description: Optical thickness of atmospheric aerosols at wavelength 550 nanometers.

Name: albsrfc
Title: Surface albedo
Justification for inclusion: Provision of mean-band surface albedo

Name: nppStem
Title: Net Primary Production Allocated to Stem as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: added for completeness with npp\_root

Name: o2
Title: Dissolved Oxygen Concentration
Description: 'Mole concentration' means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen'.

Name: exparag
Title: Downward Flux of Aragonite
Description: Downward flux of Aragonite

Name: wetnh4
Title: Wet Deposition Rate of NH4
Description: Surface deposition rate of ammonium (NH4) due to wet processes

Name: zg100
Title: Geopotential Height at 100hPa
Description: Geopotential height on the 100 hPa surface

Name: mrsfl
Title: Frozen Water Content of Soil Layer
Description: in each soil layer, the mass of water in ice phase.  Reported as "missing" for grid cells occupied entirely by "sea"

Name: wfo
Title: Water Flux into Sea Water
Description: Computed as the water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell. This is the sum \*wfonocorr\* and \*wfcorr\*.

Name: cVegTree
Title: Carbon Mass in Vegetation on Tree Tiles
Description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Vegetation" means any plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass. Plants are autotrophs i.e. "producers" of biomass using carbon obtained from carbon dioxide.

Name: scldncl
Title: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Stratiform Cloud Tops
Description: Droplets are liquid only.  Report concentration "as seen from space" over stratiform liquid cloudy portion of grid cell.  This is the value from uppermost model layer with liquid cloud or, if available, it is better to sum over all liquid cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere. Weight by total liquid cloud top fraction of  (as seen from TOA) each time sample when computing monthly mean.

Name: fVegSoil
Title: Total Carbon Mass Flux from Vegetation Directly to Soil
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area from vegetation directly into soil, without intermediate conversion to litter.

Name: tauu
Title: Surface Downward Eastward Wind Stress
Description: Downward eastward wind stress at the surface

Name: o2satos
Title: Surface Dissolved Oxygen Concentration at Saturation
Description: "Mole concentration at saturation" means the mole concentration in a saturated solution. Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction "mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen".

Name: c13Land
Title: Mass of 13C in All Terrestrial Carbon Pools
Description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass), litter (dead plant material in or above the soil), soil, and forestry and agricultural products (e.g. paper, cardboard, furniture, timber for construction, biofuels and food for both humans and livestock).

Name: hfrunoffds
Title: Temperature Flux Due to Runoff Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
Description: Heat flux associated with liquid water which drains from land. It is calculated relative to the heat that would be transported by runoff water entering the sea at zero degrees Celsius.

Name: rldcs4co2
Title: Downwelling Clear-Sky Longwave Radiation 4XCO2 Atmosphere
Description: Downwelling clear-sky longwave radiation calculated using carbon dioxide concentrations increased fourfold (includes the fluxes at the surface and TOA)

Name: rss
Title: Net Shortwave Surface Radiation
Description: Net downward shortwave radiation at the surface

Name: rsdcs4co2
Title: Downwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation 4XCO2 Atmosphere
Description: Downwelling clear-sky shortwave radiation calculated using carbon dioxide concentrations increased fourfold

Name: sfno2
Title: NO2 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: emich3oh
Title: Total emission rate of methanol
Justification for inclusion: To understand VOC budgets

Name: dms
Title: Dimethyl Sulphide (DMS) Mole Fraction
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: tropdo3chm
Title: Net Chemistry Tendency of O3 in troposphere
Justification for inclusion: To understand net chemical tendencies which tend to differ from the difference between o3prod and o3loss

Name: no2
Title: NO2 Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: vegHeightShrub
Title: Height of Shrubs
Description: Vegetation height averaged over the shrub fraction of a grid cell.

Name: prra
Title: Rainfall Flux
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.

Name: wetoa
Title: Wet Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter
Description: Deposition rate of organic matter in aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes

Name: dissicnat
Title: Natural Dissolved Inorganic Carbon Concentration
Description: Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

Name: emibbvoc
Title: total emission rate of NMVOC from all biomass burning
Justification for inclusion: To understand sources of NMVOCs

Name: rhLut
Title: Heterotrophic Respiration on Land-Use Tile as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area into atmosphere due to heterotrophic respiration on land (respiration by consumers), calculated on land-use tiles.

Name: emico
Title: Total Emission Rate of CO
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

Name: hfsso
Title: Surface Downward Sensible Heat Flux
Description: Downward sensible heat flux over sea ice free sea. The surface sensible heat flux, also called turbulent heat flux, is the exchange of heat between the surface and the air by motion of air.

Name: fracLut
Title: Percentage of Grid Cell for Each Land-Use Tile
Description: End of year values (not annual mean); note that percentage should be reported as percentage of land grid cell (example: frac\_lnd = 0.5, frac\_ocn = 0.5, frac\_crop\_lnd = 0.2 (of land portion of grid cell), then frac\_lut(crop) = 0.5\*0.2 = 0.1)

Name: emiaoa
Title: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic Organic Aerosol
Description: anthropogenic part of emioa

Name: swsffluxaero
Title: Shortwave Heating Rate Due to Volcanic Aerosols
Description: Shortwave heating rate due to volcanic aerosols to be diagnosed through double radiation call

Name: cWood
Title: Carbon Mass in Wood
Description: Carbon mass per unit area in wood, including sapwood and hardwood.

Name: utendnogw
Title: Eastward Acceleration Due to Non-Orographic Gravity Wave Drag
Description: Tendency of the eastward wind by parameterized nonorographic gravity waves.

Name: ocontemppadvect
Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (any form of eddy advection). Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

Name: fNfert
Title: Total Nitrogen Added for Cropland Fertilisation (Artificial and Manure)
Description: Total Nitrogen added for cropland fertilisation (artificial and manure). Relative to total land area of a grid cell, not relative to agricultural area

Name: fLuc
Title: Net Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to Land-Use Change [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area into atmosphere due to human changes to land (excluding forest regrowth) accounting possibly for different time-scales related to fate of the wood, for example.

Name: epfy
Title: Northward Component of the Eliassen-Palm Flux
Description: Transformed Eulerian Mean Diagnostics Meridional component Fy of Eliassen-Palm (EP) flux (Fy, Fz) derived from 6hr or higher frequency fields (use daily fields or 12 hr fields if the 6 hr are not available). Please use the definitions given by equation 3.5.3a of Andrews, Holton and Leovy text book, but scaled by density to have units m3 s-2.

Name: taUTLSadd
Title: 6 hourly instantaneous temperature at 2 additional pressure levels in the UTLS region (175 and 225 hPa)
Justification for inclusion: Requested to study impacts on aviation. Needed to diagnose clear air turbulence.

Name: wap500
Title: Pressure Tendency
Description: Omega (vertical velocity in pressure coordinates, positive downwards) at 500hPa level;

Name: mmrpm1
Title: PM1.0 Mass Mixing Ratio
Description: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 1 micrometers

Name: chegpso4
Title: Gas-Phase Production Rate of SO4
Description: proposed name: tendency\_of\_atmosphere\_mass\_content\_of\_sulfate\_dry\_aerosol\_due\_to\_gas\_phase\_net\_chemical\_production

Name: treeFracNdlEvg
Title: Needleleaf Evergreen Tree Area Percentage
Description: This is the percentage of the entire grid cell that is covered by needleleaf evergreen trees.

Name: ch4
Title: Mole Fraction of CH4
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: tntr
Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Radiative Heating
Description: Tendency of Air Temperature due to Radiative Heating

Name: fsitherm
Title: Water Flux into Sea Water Due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics
Description: computed as the sea ice thermodynamic water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

Name: ccn1
Title: CCN concentration at 1.0 percent supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size
Justification for inclusion: Addresses current gaps in ACI, nitrate aerosol budget, and climate responses

Name: intparag
Title: Aragonite Production
Description: Vertically integrated aragonite production

Name: pctisccp
Title: ISCCP Mean Cloud Top Pressure
Description: ISCCP Mean Cloud Top Pressure. Time-means are weighted by the ISCCP Total Cloud Fraction {:cltisccp} - see  <http://cfmip.metoffice.com/COSP.html>

Name: zmeso
Title: Mole Concentration of Mesozooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Description: carbon  concentration from mesozooplankton (20-200 um) component alone

Name: dissicos
Title: Surface Dissolved Inorganic Carbon Concentration
Description: Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration

Name: rsucs
Title: Upwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Upwelling clear-sky shortwave radiation  (includes the fluxes at the surface and TOA)

Name: zmla
Title: Height of Boundary Layer
Description: The atmosphere boundary layer thickness is the "depth" or "height" of the (atmosphere) planetary boundary layer.

Name: clayfrac
Title: Clay Fraction
Description: "Volume fraction" is used in the construction volume\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: tasmax
Title: Daily Maximum Near-Surface Air Temperature
Description: maximum near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature (add cell\_method attribute "time: max")

Name: tasIs
Title: Ice Sheet Near-Surface Air Temperature
Description: near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature

Name: tslsi
Title: Surface Temperature Where Land or Sea Ice
Description: Surface temperature of all surfaces except open ocean.

Name: emivoc
Title: Total Emission Rate of NMVOC
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field. \_If\_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.

Name: vegFrac
Title: Total Vegetated Percentage Cover
Description: Percentage of grid cell that is covered by vegetation.This SHOULD be the sum of tree, grass (natural and pasture), crop and shrub fractions.

Name: snd
Title: Snow Depth
Description: where land over land, this is computed as the mean thickness of snow in the land portion of the grid cell (averaging over the entire land portion, including the snow-free fraction).  Reported as 0.0 where the land fraction is 0.

Name: fgco2nat
Title: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon as Natural CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Gas exchange flux of natural CO2 (positive into ocean)

Name: ptp
Title: Tropopause Air Pressure
Description: 2D monthly mean thermal tropopause calculated using WMO tropopause definition on 3d temperature

Name: ch4losssoil
Title: Loss of CH4 due to biological consumption in the soil
Justification for inclusion: To calculate methane budgets with new methane emissions-driven modelling capability

Name: diftrbbo
Title: Ocean Tracer Bolus Biharmonic Diffusivity
Description: Parameterized mesoscale eddy advection occurs on a spatial scale of many tens of kilometres and an evolutionary time of weeks(sometimes called bolus advection). Reference: James C. McWilliams 2016, Submesoscale currents in the ocean, Proceedings of the Royal Society A: Mathematical, Physical and Engineering Sciences, volume 472, issue 2189. DOI: 10.1098/rspa.2016.0117.

Name: cLitterShrub
Title: Carbon Mass in Litter on Shrub Tiles
Description: "Litter" is dead plant material in or above the soil. It is distinct from coarse wood debris. The precise distinction between "fine" and "coarse" is model dependent. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. The sum of the quantities with standard names surface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon and subsurface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon has the standard name litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon.

Name: siextentn
Title: Sea-Ice Extent North
Description: Total area of all Northern-Hemisphere grid cells that are covered by at least 15 % areal fraction of sea ice

Name: emiso2
Title: Total Emission Rate of SO2
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

Name: tntogw
Title: Temperature Tendency Due to Orographic Gravity Wave Dissipation
Description: Temperature tendency due to dissipation of parameterized orographic gravity waves.

Name: emic3h6
Title: Total emission rate of propene
Justification for inclusion: To understand VOC budgets

Name: vt
Title: Product of Air Temperature and Northward Wind
Description: Product of air temperature and northward wind

Name: prbigthetao
Title: Sea Water Redistributed Conservative Temperature
Description: A passive tracer in an ocean model which is subject to an externally imposed perturbative surface heat flux. The passive tracer is initialised to the conservative temperature in the control climate before the perturbation is imposed. Its surface flux is the heat flux from the atmosphere, not including the imposed perturbation, and is converted to a passive tracer increment as if it were being added to conservative temperature. The passive tracer is transported within the ocean as if it were conservative temperature.
Processing Comment: This variable should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

Name: cTotFireLut
Title: Total Carbon Loss from Natural and Managed Fire on Land-Use Tile, Including Deforestation Fires [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Different from LMON this flux should include all fires occurring on the land use tile, including natural, man-made and deforestation fires

Name: fediss
Title: Particulate Source of Dissolved Iron
Description: Dissolution, remineralization and desorption of iron back to the dissolved phase

Name: fNdep
Title: Dry and Wet Deposition of Reactive Nitrogen onto Land
Description: Surface deposition rate of nitrogen.

Name: sedustCI
Title: Sedimentation Flux of Dust Mode Coarse Insoluble
Description: Dry mass deposition rate of dust aerosol.

Name: rsutcsch4ref
Title: Top of atmosphere shortwave outgoing radiative flux under clear sky conditions from diagnostic radiation call with reference methane
Justification for inclusion: To calculate instantaneous radiative forcing by methane
Atmosphere review comments copy: CF name marked for acceptance (26th Sept)

Name: co23D
Title: 3D-Field of Transported CO2
Description: report 3D field of model simulated atmospheric CO2 mass mixing ration on model levels

Name: od550oa
Title: Total Organic Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm
Description: Total aerosol AOD due to organic aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

Name: ta700
Title: Air Temperature
Description: Air temperature at 700hPa

Name: rsusLut
Title: Surface Upwelling Shortwave on Land-Use Tile
Description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "shortwave" means shortwave radiation. Upwelling radiation is radiation from below. It does not mean "net upward". When thought of as being incident on a surface, a radiative flux is sometimes called "irradiance". In addition, it is identical with the quantity measured by a cosine-collector light-meter and sometimes called "vector irradiance". In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.

Name: loadsoa
Title: Load of Dry Aerosol Secondary Organic Matter
Description: The total dry mass of secondary particulate organic aerosol particles per unit area.

Name: fNleach
Title: Total Nitrogen Loss to Leaching or Runoff (Sum of Ammonium, Nitrite and Nitrate)
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics. The specification of a physical process by the phrase "due\_to\_" process means that the quantity named is a single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase. "Leaching" means the loss of water soluble chemical species from soil. Runoff is the liquid water which drains from land. If not specified, "runoff" refers to the sum of surface runoff and subsurface drainage.

Name: tntscpbl
Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Stratiform Cloud and Precipitation and Boundary Layer Mixing
Description: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Stratiform Cloud and Precipitation and Boundary Layer Mixing (to be specified only in  models which do not separate cloud, precipitation and boundary layer terms.  Includes all boundary layer terms including diffusive ones.)

Name: wfcorr
Title: Water Flux Correction
Description: Computed as the water flux into the ocean due to flux correction divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.

Name: emiaco
Title: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic CO
Description: Anthropogenic  emission of CO.

Name: emic4h10
Title: Total emission rate of butane
Justification for inclusion: To understand VOC budgets

Name: masso
Title: Sea Water Mass
Description: Total mass of liquid sea water. For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times total volume.

Name: wetso2
Title: Wet Deposition Rate of SO2
Description: Deposition rate of sulfur dioxide due to wet processes

Name: concdust
Title: Concentration of Dust
Description: Mass concentration means mass per unit volume and is used in the construction mass\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen". "Aerosol" means the system of suspended liquid or solid particles in air (except cloud droplets) and their carrier gas, the air itself. Aerosol particles take up ambient water (a process known as hygroscopic growth) depending on the relative humidity and the composition of the particles. "Dry aerosol particles" means aerosol particles without any water uptake.

Name: cdnc
Title: Cloud Liquid Droplet Number Concentration
Description: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration in liquid water clouds.

Name: sirdgconc
Title: Percentage Cover of Sea Ice by Ridging
Description: Fraction of sea ice, by area, which is covered by sea ice ridges, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice .
Comments: Unit change for consistency

Name: vqint
Title: Northward Humidity Transport
Description: Column integrated northward wind times specific humidity

Name: talknat
Title: Natural Total Alkalinity
Description: total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, borate, phosphorus, silicon, and nitrogen components) at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

Name: reffclws
Title: Stratiform Cloud Liquid Droplet Effective Radius
Description: Droplets are liquid.  The effective radius is defined as the ratio of the third moment over the second moment of the particle size distribution and the time-mean should be calculated, weighting the individual samples by the cloudy fraction of the grid cell.

Name: tauupbl
Title: Eastward Surface Stress from Planetary Boundary Layer Scheme
Description: The  downward eastward stress associated with the models parameterization of the planetary boundary layer. (This request is related to a WGNE effort to understand how models parameterize the surface stresses.)

Name: o3inst
Title: Instantaneous O3 volume mixing ratio
Justification for inclusion: Used with e90inst to understand differences in ozone across models as a result of atmospheric transport

Name: cLeaf
Title: Carbon Mass in Leaves
Description: Carbon mass per unit area in leaves.

Name: columnmassflux
Title: Column Integrated Mass Flux
Description: Column integral of (mcu-mcd)

Name: epsi100
Title: Downward Flux of Particulate Silicon
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

Name: fg14co2
Title: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon-14 as 14CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Gas exchange flux of carbon-14 as CO2 (positive into ocean)

Name: limnsw
Title: Ice Sheet Mass That Does not Displace Sea Water
Description: The ice sheet mass is computed as the volume above flotation times density. Changes in land\_ice\_mass\_not\_displacing\_sea\_water will always result in a change in sea level, unlike changes in land\_ice\_mass which may not result in sea level change (such as melting of the floating ice shelves, or portion of ice that sits on bedrock below sea level)

Name: dissic
Title: Dissolved Inorganic Carbon Concentration
Description: Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration

Name: tntscp
Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Stratiform Clouds and Precipitation
Description: The phrase "tendency\_of\_X" means derivative of X with respect to time. Air temperature is the bulk temperature of the air, not the surface (skin) temperature. The specification of a physical process by the phrase "due\_to\_" process means that the quantity named is a single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase. A variable with the standard name tendency\_of\_air\_temperature\_due\_to\_stratiform\_cloud\_and\_precipitation should contain net latent heating effects of all processes which convert stratiform clouds and precipitation between water vapour, liquid or ice phases. In an atmosphere model, stratiform cloud is that produced by large-scale convergence (not the convection schemes).

Name: lai
Title: Leaf Area Index
Description: A ratio obtained by dividing the total upper leaf surface area of vegetation by the (horizontal) surface area of the land on which it grows.

Name: abs550ss
Title: Ambient Seasalt Aerosol Absorption Optical Thickness at 550nm
Justification for inclusion: To unravel reason for model spread in direct aerosol effect

Name: nh50
Title: Artificial Tracer with 50 Day Lifetime
Description: Fixed surface layer mixing ratio over 30o-50oN (100ppbv), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.

Name: fN2O
Title: Total Land N2O Flux
Description: Surface upward flux of nitrous oxide (N2O) from vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass), litter (dead plant material in or above the soil), soil.

Name: hfrs
Title: Heat Transferred to Snowpack by Rainfall
Description: Heat transferred to a snow cover by rain..

Name: sios
Title: Surface Total Dissolved Inorganic Silicon Concentration
Description: Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction "mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen". "Dissolved inorganic silicon" means the sum of all inorganic silicon in solution (including silicic acid and its first dissociated anion SiO(OH)3-).

Name: sidmassgrowthwat
Title: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Growth in Supercooled Open Water (Frazil)
Description: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to sea ice formation in supercooled water (often through frazil formation) divided by grid-cell area. Together, sidmassgrowthwat and sidmassgrowthbot should give total ice growth

Name: ua200
Title: Zonal wind at 200 hPa
Justification for inclusion: Eastward wind at 200 hPa when combined with the existing 6hrPlevPt.ua variable at 250 hPa can be used to calculate deep layer shear

Name: fNAnthDisturb
Title: Nitrogen Mass Flux out of Land Due to any Human Activity
Description: will require some careful definition to make sure we capture everything - any human activity that releases nitrogen from land  instead of into product pool goes here. E.g. Deforestation fire, harvest assumed to decompose straight away, grazing...

Name: od550no3
Title: Nitrate Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm
Description: Total aerosol AOD due to nitrate aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

Name: hur
Title: Relative Humidity
Description: The relative humidity with respect to liquid water for T> 0 C, and with respect to ice for T<0 C.

Name: cltc
Title: Convective Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: Convective cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes only convective cloud.

Name: intpn2
Title: Nitrogen Fixation Rate in Ocean
Description: Vertically integrated nitrogen fixation

Name: dryhno3
Title: Dry deposition of HNO3
Justification for inclusion: To calculate nitrogen budget

Name: loadss
Title: Load of Sea-Salt Aerosol
Description: The total dry mass of sea salt aerosol particles per unit area.

Name: fbddtdisi
Title: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Silicon Due to Biological Activity
Description: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of dissolved inorganic silicate

Name: sisnconc
Title: Snow Area Percentage
Description: Percentage of sea ice, by area, which is covered by snow, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice . Exclude snow that lies on land or land ice.

Name: phycdiaz
Title: carbon concentration of diazotrophs
Justification for inclusion: Requested by Fish-MIP as part of ISIMIP. Needed for model intercomparisons for marine biodiversity and ecosystems.

Name: mlotst
Title: Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T
Description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface.

Name: zfullo
Title: Depth Below Geoid of Ocean Layer
Description: Depth below geoid

Name: fco2nat
Title: Surface Carbon Mass Flux into the Atmosphere Due to Natural Sources [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: This is what the atmosphere sees (on its own grid).  This field should be equivalent to the combined natural fluxes of carbon  that account for natural exchanges between the atmosphere and land (nep) or ocean (fgco2) reservoirs.

Name: thkcellvo
Title: Gridbox Thickness on v points
Proposer name: Jenny Mecking – Ocean and Sea Ice Author Team – National Oceanography Centre – Climate and Uncertainty group
Justification for inclusion: Having the gridbox thickness be accurate at all time points and gridboxes at all model grid points used in the calculations. This is particularly true if ocean transects are being investigated. Previously this information was only provided on t points and it is important to distinguish between t, u, and v points.

Name: cLitterLut
Title: Carbon  in Above and Below-Ground Litter Pools on Land-Use Tiles
Description: end of year values (not annual mean)

Name: modelCellAreai
Title: The Cell Area of the Ice Sheet Model
Description: Horizontal area of ice-sheet grid cells

Name: siflswdtop
Title: Downwelling Shortwave Flux over Sea Ice
Description: The downwelling shortwave flux over sea ice (always positive by sign convention)

Name: fgco2
Title: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon as CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Gas exchange flux of CO2 (positive into ocean)

Name: fNup
Title: Total Plant Nitrogen Uptake (Sum of Ammonium and Nitrate) Irrespective of the Source of Nitrogen
Description: The uptake of nitrogen by fixation: nitrogen fixation means the uptake of nitrogen gas directly from the atmosphere.

Name: ec550aer
Title: Aerosol Extinction Coefficient
Description: Aerosol volume extinction coefficient at 550nm wavelength.

Name: tpf
Title: Permafrost Layer Thickness
Description: The mean thickness of the permafrost layer in the land portion of the grid cell.  Reported as zero in permafrost-free regions.

Name: bigthetao
Title: Sea Water Conservative Temperature
Description: Sea water conservative temperature (this should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field)
Processing Comment: This variable should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.
Comments: Clearly labelling where there are choices between variables.

Name: ua100m
Title: Eastward Wind at 100m
Description: Zonal wind at 100m height

Name: physios
Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Silicon in Sea Water
Description: sum of phytoplankton silica component concentrations

Name: hus850
Title: Specific Humidity
Description: Specific humidity is the mass fraction of water vapor in (moist) air.

Name: rsdcsafbnd
Title: Downwelling Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free, Shortwave Radiation in Bands
Description: Calculated in the absence of aerosols and clouds (following Ghan). This requires a double-call in the radiation code with precisely the same meteorology.

Name: reffccwctop
Title: Cloud-Top Effective Radius of Liquid or Ice Cloud at Liquid or Ice Cloud Top
Justification for inclusion: To understand aerosol-cloud interactions

Name: clwvimodis
Title: MODIS Condensed Water Path
Justification for inclusion: To evaluate clouds in climate model by comparing with satellite observations the output of satellite simulators allows for a more quantitative comparison of model and satellite data. Until now only cloud coverage is part of the physical variables in the CMOR tables. Additional insight into the models’ performance in reproducing observed cloud properties is expected from using additional output from the COSP satellite simulator package, in particular ice and liquid water path resembling MODIS measurements.

Name: rlucs
Title: Upwelling Clear-Sky Longwave Radiation
Description: Upwelling clear-sky longwave radiation  (includes the fluxes at the surface and TOA)

Name: prrsn
Title: Fraction of Rainfall on Snow
Description: The fraction of the grid averaged rainfall which falls on the snow pack

Name: utendepfd
Title: Tendency of Eastward Wind Due to Eliassen-Palm Flux Divergence
Description: Tendency of the zonal mean zonal wind due to the divergence of the Eliassen-Palm flux.

Name: chlcalc
Title: Mass Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water
Description: chlorophyll concentration from the calcite-producing phytoplankton component alone

Name: ocontempmint
Title: Depth Integral of Product of Sea Water Density and Conservative Temperature
Description: Full column sum of density\*cell thickness\*conservative temperature. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.

Name: siareaacrossline
Title: Sea-Ice Area Flux Through Straits
Description: net (sum of transport in all directions) sea ice area transport through the following four passages, positive into the Arctic Ocean 1. Fram Strait = (11.5W,81.3N to (10.5E,79.6N) 2. Canadian Archipelago = (128.2W,70.6N) to (59.3W,82.1N) 3. Barents opening = (16.8E,76.5N) to (19.2E,70.2N) 4. Bering Strait = (171W,66.2N) to (166W,65N)

Name: tropo3ste
Title: Tropospheric ozone volume mixing ratio due to stratosphere-troposphere exchange (STE)
Justification for inclusion: To understand dynamic processes affecting tropospheric ozone

Name: tauvnogw
Title: Northward Reynolds stress from non-orographic gravity wave parameterization
Justification for inclusion: Gravity wave momentum fluxes are the key quantity within the gravity wave parameterization schemes. Their divergence results to the drag on the background flow. Also, they are much easier comparable to observations than the drags themselves.
Proposed CF Standard Name: Northward Reynolds stress from non-orographic gravity wave parameterization

Name: uv
Title: Product of Eastward Wind and Northward Wind
Description: u\*v

Name: rsuscsaf
Title: Surface Upwelling Clean Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Surface Upwelling Clear-sky, Aerosol Free Shortwave Radiation

Name: evspsblpot
Title: Potential Evapotranspiration
Description: at surface; potential flux of water into the atmosphere due to conversion of both liquid and solid phases to vapor (from underlying surface and vegetation)

Name: cli
Title: Mass Fraction of Cloud Ice
Description: Includes both large-scale and convective cloud. This is calculated as the mass of cloud ice in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell. It includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
Comments: Precipating hydrometeors

Name: osaltdiff
Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Dianeutral Mixing
Description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized dianeutral mixing.

Name: fNgasNonFire
Title: Total Nitrogen Lost to the Atmosphere (Including NHx, NOx, N2O, N2) from All Processes Except Fire
Description: Flux of Nitrogen from the land into the atmosphere due to all processes other than fire

Name: diftrblo
Title: Ocean Tracer Diffusivity Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
Description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced advective transport. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the 'thickness' diffusivity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was called 'ocean tracer bolus laplacian diffusivity'.  The CMIP6 name is physically more relevant.

Name: rhShrub
Title: Heterotrophic Respiration on Shrub Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Total RH of shrubs in the grid cell

Name: tropch4loss
Title: Tropospheric loss of CH4 from chemical destruction
Justification for inclusion: To calculate methane budgets with new methane emissions-driven modelling capability

Name: sidmassmelttop
Title: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Surface Melting
Description: The rate of change of sea ice mass through melting at the ice surface divided by grid-cell area

Name: twap
Title: Product of Air Temperature and Omega
Description: Product of air temperature and pressure tendency

Name: mrfsofr
Title: Average Layer Fraction of Frozen Moisture
Description: Fraction of soil moisture mass in the solid phase in each user-defined soil layer (3D variable)

Name: fshtrans
Title: Florida Strait Heat Transport
Proposer name: Climate and Uncertainty - National Oceanography Centre
Justification for inclusion: Transport through the Florida Strait is import for climatic changes, especially on decadal time scales.

Name: calcos
Title: Surface Calcite Concentration
Description: sum of particulate calcite component concentrations (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

Name: rsdo
Title: Downwelling Shortwave Radiation in Sea Water
Description: Downwelling radiation is radiation from above. It does not mean "net downward".  When thought of as being incident on a surface, a radiative flux is sometimes called "irradiance".  In addition, it is identical with the quantity measured by a cosine-collector light-meter and sometimes called "vector irradiance".  In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.  "shortwave" means shortwave radiation.

Name: ppdiaz
Title: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Diazotrophs
Description: Primary (organic carbon) production by the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone

Name: hur100
Title: Relative humidity at 100 hPa
Justification for inclusion: Relative humidity at 6hrPt frequencies is useful to distinguish between tropical systems.

Name: clcalipso2
Title: CALIPSO Cloud Cover Percentage Undetected by CloudSat (as Percentage of Area Covered)
Description: Clouds detected by CALIPSO but below the detectability threshold of CloudSat

Name: drybc
Title: Dry Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass
Description: Dry deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.

Name: msftyrhompa
Title: Ocean Y Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
Description: CMIP5 called this "due to Bolus Advection".  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
Processing Comment: For a model with a cartesian latxlon grid this should be omitted.

Name: dtesn
Title: Change in Snow and Ice Cold Content
Description: Change in cold content over the snow layer for which the energy balance is calculated, accumulated over the sampling time interval. This should also include the energy contained in the liquid water in the snow pack.

Name: lwtoaasdust
Title: TOA All-Sky Longwave Radiative Forcing Due to Dust
Description: Instantaneous forcing is the radiative flux change caused instantaneously by an imposed change in radiative forcing agent (greenhouse gases, aerosol, solar radiation, etc.).

Name: bldep
Title: Boundary Layer Depth
Description: Boundary layer depth

Name: ec
Title: Interception Evaporation
Description: Evaporation flux from water in all phases on the vegetation canopy.

Name: jpdftaureliqmodis
Title: MODIS Optical Thickness-Particle Size Joint Distribution, Liquid
Description: Joint probability distribution function, giving probability of cloud as a function of optical thickness and particle size, as measured by MODIS. For liquid cloud particles.

Name: tsIs
Title: Ice Sheet Surface Temperature
Description: Temperature of the lower boundary of the atmosphere

Name: edt
Title: Eddy Diffusivity Coefficient for Temperature
Description: Vertical diffusion coefficient for temperature due to parametrised eddies

Name: t20d
Title: Depth of 20 degree Celsius Isotherm
Description: This quantity, sometimes called the "isotherm depth", is the depth (if it exists) at which the sea water potential temperature equals some specified value. This value should be specified in a scalar coordinate variable. Depth is the vertical distance below the surface. Potential temperature is the temperature a parcel of air or sea water would have if moved adiabatically to sea level pressure.

Name: c13Soil
Title: Mass of 13C in Soil Pool
Description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in soil.

Name: phalf
Title: Pressure on Model Half-Levels
Description: Air pressure on model half-levels

Name: rivi
Title: River Inflow
Description: Inflow of River Water into Cell

Name: phnat
Title: Natural pH
Description: negative log10 of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1.

Name: siflfwdrain
Title: Freshwater Flux from Sea-Ice Surface
Description: Total flux of fresh water from sea-ice surface into underlying ocean. This combines both surface melt water that drains directly into the ocean and the drainage of surface melt pond. By definition, this flux is always positive.

Name: bddtdin
Title: Rate of Change of Nitrogen Nutrient Due to Biological Activity
Description: Net total of biological terms in time rate of change of nitrogen nutrients (e.g. NO3+NH4)

Name: sicompstren
Title: Compressive Sea Ice Strength
Description: Computed strength of the ice pack, defined as the energy (J m-2) dissipated per unit area removed from the ice pack under compression, and assumed proportional to the change in potential energy caused by ridging. For Hibler-type models, this is P (= P\*h exp(-C(1-A)) where P\* is compressive strength, h ice thickness, A compactness and C strength reduction constant).

Name: htovovrt
Title: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Overturning
Description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

Name: zos
Title: Sea Surface Height Above Geoid
Description: This is the dynamic sea level, so should have zero global area mean. It should not include inverse barometer depressions from sea ice.
Comments: Incorrect statement about inverse barometer effects of sea-ice

Name: nLitter
Title: Nitrogen Mass in Litter Pool
Description: Report missing data over ocean grid cells. For fractional land report value averaged over the land fraction.

Name: prsnIs
Title: Ice Sheet Snowfall Flux
Description: at surface; includes precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase

Name: oxloss
Title: Total Odd Oxygen (Ox) Loss Rate
Description: total chemical loss rate for o+o1d+o3

Name: fgco2abio
Title: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon as Abiotic CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Gas exchange flux of abiotic CO2 (positive into ocean)

Name: flandice
Title: Water Flux into Sea Water from Land Ice
Description: Computed as the water flux into the ocean due to land ice (runoff water from surface and base of land ice or melt from base of ice shelf or vertical ice front) into the ocean divided by the area ocean portion of the grid cell

Name: phyfeos
Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Iron in Sea Water
Description: sum of phytoplankton iron component concentrations

Name: emic3h8
Title: Total emission rate of propane
Justification for inclusion: To understand VOC budgets

Name: vwap
Title: Product of Northward Wind and Omega
Description: v\*omega

Name: difvso
Title: Ocean Vertical Salt Diffusivity
Description: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to prognostic salinity field.

Name: huss
Title: Near-Surface Specific Humidity
Description: Near-surface (usually, 2 meter) specific humidity.

Name: hfdsn
Title: Downward Heat Flux into Snow Where Land over Land
Description: the net downward heat flux from the atmosphere into the snow that lies on land divided by the land area in the grid cell; reported as 0.0 for snow-free land regions or where the land fraction is 0.

Name: po4os
Title: Surface Total Dissolved Inorganic Phosphorus Concentration
Description: Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction "mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen". "Dissolved inorganic phosphorus" means the sum of all inorganic phosphorus in solution (including phosphate, hydrogen phosphate, dihydrogen phosphate, and phosphoric acid).

Name: maxpblz
Title: Maximum PBL Height
Description: maximum boundary layer height during the day (add cell\_methods attribute: "time: maximum")

Name: tnhusmp
Title: Tendency of Specific Humidity Due to Model Physics
Description: Tendency of specific humidity due to model physics. This includes sources and sinks from parametrized moist physics (e.g. convection, boundary layer, stratiform condensation/evaporation, etc.) and excludes sources and sinks from resolved dynamics or from horizontal or vertical numerical diffusion not associated with model physics.  For example any diffusive mixing by the boundary layer scheme would be included.

Name: cltcalipso
Title: CALIPSO Total Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: Total cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen by the  Cloud-Aerosol Lidar and Infrared Pathfinder Satellite Observation (CALIPSO) instrument. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

Name: o2min
Title: Oxygen Minimum Concentration
Description: 'Mole concentration' means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen'. The concentration of any chemical species, whether particulate or dissolved, may vary with depth in the ocean.  A depth profile may go through one or more local minima in concentration. The mole\_concentration\_of\_molecular\_oxygen\_in\_sea\_water\_at\_shallowest\_local\_minimum\_in\_vertical\_profile is the mole concentration of oxygen at the local minimum in the concentration profile that occurs closest to the sea surface.

Name: lossch4
Title: Monthly Loss of Atmospheric Methane
Description: monthly averaged atmospheric loss

Name: tSoilPools
Title: Turnover Rate of Each Model Soil Carbon Pool
Description: defined as 1/(turnover time) for each soil pool. Use the same pools reported under cSoilPools

Name: loaddust
Title: Load of Dust
Description: The total dry mass of dust aerosol particles per unit area.

Name: sosga
Title: Global Average Sea Surface Salinity
Description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.

Name: od870aer
Title: Ambient Aerosol Optical Depth at 870nm
Description: AOD from the ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 870nm"

Name: sishevel
Title: Maximum Shear of Sea-Ice Velocity Field
Description: Maximum shear of sea-ice velocity field (second shear strain invariant)

Name: cheaqpso4
Title: Aqueous-Phase Production Rate of SO4
Description: proposed name: tendency\_of\_atmosphere\_mass\_content\_of\_sulfate\_dry\_aerosol\_due\_to\_aqueous\_phase\_net\_chemical\_production

Name: clmcalipso
Title: CALIPSO Mid Level Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: Percentage cloud cover in layer centred on 560hPa

Name: minpblz
Title: Minimum PBL Height
Description: minimum boundary layer height during the day (add cell\_methods attribute: "time: minimum")

Name: gppGrass
Title: Gross Primary Production on Grass Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Total GPP of grass in the grid cell

Name: raLut
Title: Autotrophic Respiration on Land-Use Tile as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area into atmosphere due to autotrophic respiration on land (respiration by producers) [see rh for heterotrophic production]. Calculated on land-use tiles.

Name: intdic
Title: Dissolved Inorganic Carbon Content
Description: Vertically integrated DIC

Name: intppdiaz
Title: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Diazotrophs
Description: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by the diazotrophs alone

Name: fric
Title: Downward Inorganic Carbon Flux at Ocean Bottom
Description: Inorganic Carbon loss to sediments

Name: chegph2oo1d
Title: Chemical production of OH by reaction of O1D+H2O
Justification for inclusion: To calculate the primary production of hydroxyl

Name: cLitterCwd
Title: Carbon Mass in Coarse Woody Debris
Description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Wood debris" means dead organic matter composed of coarse wood. It is distinct from fine litter. The precise distinction between "fine" and "coarse" is model dependent.

Name: hursminCrop
Title: Daily Minimum Near-Surface Relative Humidity over Crop Tile
Description: The relative humidity with respect to liquid water for T> 0 C, and with respect to ice for T<0 C.

Name: treeFracNdlDcd
Title: Needleleaf Deciduous Tree Area Percentage
Description: This is the percentage of the entire grid cell that is covered by needleleaf deciduous trees.

Name: siforcetilty
Title: Sea-Surface Tilt Term in Force Balance (Y-Component)
Description: Y-component of force on sea ice caused by sea-surface tilt

Name: zsatarag
Title: Aragonite Saturation Depth
Description: Depth of aragonite saturation horizon (0 if undersaturated at all depths, "missing" if supersaturated at all depths; if multiple horizons exist, the shallowest should be taken).

Name: sltovovrt
Title: Northward Ocean Salt Transport Due to Overturning
Description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

Name: htovgyre
Title: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Gyre
Description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

Name: siitdsnthick
Title: Snow Thickness in Ice Thickness Categories
Description: Actual thickness of snow in each  category (NOT volume divided by grid area),  (vector with one entry for each thickness category starting from the thinnest category, netcdf file should use thickness bounds of categories as third coordinate axis)

Name: rtmt
Title: Net Downward Radiative Flux at Top of Model
Description: Net Downward Radiative Flux at Top of Model : I.e., at the top of that portion of the atmosphere where dynamics are explicitly treated by the model. This is reported only if it differs from the net downward radiative flux at the top of the atmosphere.

Name: sidmassgrowthbot
Title: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Basal Growth
Description: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to vertical growth of existing sea ice at its base divided by grid-cell area.

Name: hno3
Title: HNO3 Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: raVgt
Title: Autotrophic Respiration on Vegetation type as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Justification for inclusion: This physical parameter allows to assess phenology simulated by models and the relative impact for future projections at vegetation type level.

Name: hcfc22global
Title: Global Mean Mole Fraction of HCFC22
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  A chemical species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen'. The chemical formula for HCFC22 is CHClF2.  The IUPAC name for HCFC22 is chloro-difluoro-methane.

Name: fHarvestToAtmos
Title: Harvested Biomass That Goes Straight into Atmosphere as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: any harvested carbon that is assumed to decompose immediately into the atmosphere is reported here

Name: vo
Title: Sea Water Y Velocity
Description: Prognostic y-ward velocity component resolved by the model.

Name: ut
Title: Product of Air Temperature and Eastward Wind
Description: Product of air temperature and eastward wind

Name: thkcelluo
Title: Gridbox Thickness on u points
Proposer name: Jenny Mecking – Ocean and Sea Ice Author Team – National Oceanography Centre – Climate and Uncertainty group
Justification for inclusion: Having the gridbox thickness be accurate at all time points and gridboxes at all model grid points used in the calculations. This is particularly true if ocean transects are being investigated. Previously this information was only provided on t points and it is important to distinguish between t, u, and v points.

Name: fVegFire
Title: Carbon Mass Flux from Vegetation into Atmosphere Due to CO2 Emission from All Fire [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Required for unambiguous separation of vegetation and soil + litter turnover times, since total fire flux draws from both sources

Name: fbddtdip
Title: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Phosphorus Due to Biological Activity
Description: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of phosphate

Name: ra
Title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to Autotrophic (Plant) Respiration on Land [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area into atmosphere due to autotrophic respiration on land (respiration by producers) [see rh for heterotrophic production]

Name: cfc11global
Title: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC11
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC11 is CFCl3.  The IUPAC name for CFC11 is trichloro-fluoro-methane.

Name: emibvoc
Title: Total Emission Rate of Biogenic NMVOC
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.\_If\_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.

Name: dryno3
Title: Dry deposition of nitrate aerosol
Justification for inclusion: To calculate nitrogen and nitrate aerosol budgets

Name: diftrelo
Title: Ocean Tracer Epineutral Laplacian Diffusivity
Description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced diffusive transport oriented along neutral or isopycnal directions. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the neutral diffusivity or isopycnal diffusivity or Redi diffusivity.

Name: rsdscsbnd
Title: Surface Downwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation for Each Band
Description: Calculated with aerosols but without clouds. This is a standard clear-sky calculation

Name: zmswaero
Title: Zonal Mean Shortwave Heating Rate Due to Volcanic Aerosols
Description: shortwave heating rate due to volcanic aerosols to be diagnosed through double radiation call, zonal average values required

Name: od550so4
Title: Sulfate Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm
Description: Total aerosol AOD due to sulfate aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

Name: dmso
Title: Mole Concentration of Dimethyl Sulphide in Sea Water
Description: Mole concentration of dimethyl sulphide in water

Name: c14Veg
Title: Mass of 14C in Vegetation
Description: Carbon-14 mass content per unit area in vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass).

Name: cfc12
Title: Mole Concentration of CFC12 in Sea Water
Description: Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction "mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen". The chemical formula for CFC12 is CF2Cl2. The IUPAC name for CFC12 is dichloro-difluoro-methane.

Name: epn100
Title: Downward Flux of Particulate Nitrogen
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

Name: tauuo
Title: Sea Water Surface Downward X Stress
Description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

Name: ksat
Title: Saturated Hydraulic Conductivity
Description: Hydraulic conductivity is the constant k in Darcy's Law q=-k grad h for fluid flow q (volume transport per unit area i.e. velocity) through a porous medium, where h is the hydraulic head (pressure expressed as an equivalent depth of water).

Name: gppShrub
Title: Gross Primary Production on Shrub Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Total GPP of shrubs in the grid cell

Name: zossq
Title: Square of Sea Surface Height Above Geoid
Description: Surface ocean geoid defines z=0.

Name: rGrowth
Title: Total Autotrophic Respiration on Land as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Growth respiration is defined as the additional carbon cost for the synthesis of new growth.

Name: nppRoot
Title: Net Primary Production Allocated to Roots as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: This is the rate of carbon uptake by roots due to NPP

Name: uo
Title: Sea Water X Velocity
Description: Prognostic x-ward velocity component resolved by the model.

Name: intppcocco
Title: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by coccolithophores
Justification for inclusion: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by the coccolithophores component alone

Name: halossl
Title: regional halosteric sea level

Name: siltfrac
Title: Silt Fraction
Description: Volume fraction of silt in soil

Name: sidmasstranx
Title: X-Component of Sea-Ice Mass Transport
Description: Includes transport of both sea ice and snow by advection

Name: somint
Title: Depth Integral of Product of Sea Water Density and Prognostic Salinity
Description: Full column sum of density\*cell thickness\*prognostic salinity. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.

Name: lossco
Title: Monthly Loss of Atmospheric Carbon Monoxide
Description: monthly averaged atmospheric loss

Name: albl
Title: Surface Albedo of Land without ice cover
Justification for inclusion: for the understanding of the response of the cryosphere in changing climates

Name: siitdconc
Title: Sea-Ice Area Percentages in Thickness Categories
Description: Percentage of grid cell covered by each ice-thickness category (vector with one entry for each thickness category starting from the thinnest category, netcdf file should use thickness bounds of the categories as third coordinate axis)

Name: pp
Title: Primary Carbon Production by Phytoplankton
Description: total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton

Name: rlutch4ref
Title: Top of atmosphere outgoing longwave radiative fluxes from diagnostic radiation call with reference methane
Justification for inclusion: To calculate instantaneous radiative forcing by methane
Atmosphere review comments copy: CF name marked for acceptance (26th Sept)

Name: abs550so4
Title: Ambient Sulfate Aerosol Absorption Optical Thickness at 550nm
Justification for inclusion: To unravel reason for model spread in direct aerosol effect

Name: cfadDbze94
Title: CloudSat Radar Reflectivity CFAD
Description: CFAD (Cloud Frequency Altitude Diagrams) are frequency distributions of radar  reflectivity (or lidar scattering ratio) as a function of altitude. The variable cfadDbze94 is defined as the simulated relative frequency of occurrence of radar reflectivity in sampling volumes defined by altitude bins. The radar is observing at a frequency of 94GHz.

Name: mrsofc
Title: Capacity of Soil to Store Water (Field Capacity)
Description: The bulk water content retained by the soil at -33 J/kg of suction pressure, expressed as mass per unit land area; report as missing where there is no land

Name: prhmax
Title: Maximum Hourly Precipitation Rate
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.

Name: sitempbot
Title: Temperature at Ice-Ocean Interface
Description: Report temperature at interface, NOT temperature within lowermost model layer

Name: simpmass
Title: Meltpond Mass per Unit Area (as Depth)
Description: Meltpond Depth

Name: difvtrbo
Title: Ocean Vertical Tracer Diffusivity Due to Background
Description: Vertical/dianeutral diffusivity applied to tracers due to the background (i.e. caused by a time invariant imposed field which may be either constant over the globe or spatially varying, depending on the ocean model used).

Name: sltbasin
Title: Northward Ocean Salt Transport
Description: function of latitude, basin

Name: limfemisc
Title: Iron Limitation of Other Phytoplankton
Description: Phytoplankton are algae that grow where there is sufficient light to support photosynthesis. "Miscellaneous phytoplankton" are all those phytoplankton that are not diatoms, diazotrophs, calcareous phytoplankton, picophytoplankton or other separately named components of the phytoplankton population. "Iron growth limitation" means the ratio of the growth rate of a species population in the environment (where there is a finite availability of iron) to the theoretical growth rate if there were no such limit on iron availability.

Name: dfeos
Title: Surface Dissolved Iron Concentration
Description: dissolved iron in sea water is meant to include both Fe2+ and Fe3+ ions (but not, e.g., particulate detrital iron)

Name: cldnci
Title: Ice Crystal Number Concentration of Cloud Tops
Description: Concentration 'as seen from space' over ice-cloud portion of grid cell.  This is the value from uppermost model layer with ice cloud or, if available, it is the sum over all ice cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere. Weight by total ice cloud top fraction (as seen from TOA) of each time sample when computing monthly mean.

Name: spco2abio
Title: Abiotic Surface Aqueous Partial Pressure of CO2
Description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. The chemical formula for carbon dioxide is CO2. In ocean biogeochemistry models, an "abiotic analogue" is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable when biological effects on ocean carbon concentration and alkalinity are ignored. The partial pressure of a gaseous constituent of air is the pressure which it alone would exert with unchanged temperature and number of moles per unit volume. The partial pressure of a dissolved gas in sea water is the partial pressure in air with which it would be in equilibrium. The partial pressure difference between sea water and air is positive when the partial pressure of the dissolved gas in sea water is greater than the partial pressure in air.

Name: sichl
Title: Amount of Total Ice Algae Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Ice
Justification for inclusion: Some CMIP7 models now have sea ice biogeochemistry included and are interested in saving these variables. Models that include sea-ice biogeochemistry support closing the carbon and nutrient s' cycles in the sea-ice zone.

Name: rlutcsaf
Title: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation
Description: Flux corresponding to rlutcs resulting from aerosol-free call to radiation, following Ghan (ACP, 2013)

Name: dslw
Title: Change in Soil Moisture
Description: The phrase "change\_over\_time\_in\_X" means change in a quantity X over a time-interval, which should be defined by the bounds of the time coordinate. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. The mass content of water in soil refers to the vertical integral from the surface down to the bottom of the soil model. For the content between specified levels in the soil, standard names including "content\_of\_soil\_layer" are used. "Water" means water in all phases.

Name: sisnmasss
Title: Snow Mass on Sea-Ice South
Justification for inclusion: We propose to add this new physical parameter for the total mass of snow on sea ice over the Southern Hemisphere to compliment the other sea ice integrated total hemispheric diagnostics (siarean, siareas, siextentn, siextents, sivoln, and sivols) and allow for a complete high-level analysis of the total mass of the cryosphere in the Earth system.

Name: cropFrac
Title: Percentage Crop Cover
Description: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by crop.

Name: ch4ref
Title: Reference CH4 volume mixing ratio
Justification for inclusion: To calculate instantaneous radiative forcing by methane
Atmosphere review comments copy: CF name marked for acceptance (26th Sept)

Name: c2h6
Title: C2H6 Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: fstrans
Title: Volume Transport Through Florida Strait
Proposer name: Climate and Uncertainty - National Oceanography Centre
Justification for inclusion: Important for climate and correlates with the AMOC on decadal timescales, but consideration of the variability is lacking in contemporary studies.  This is a region with excellent observational record.

Name: ocontemptend
Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from all processes. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

Name: fddtdife
Title: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Iron
Description: vertical integral of net time rate of change of dissolved inorganic iron

Name: eminox
Title: Total Emission Rate of NOx
Description: NOx=NO+NO2. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

Name: wetdust
Title: Wet Deposition Rate of Dust
Description: Surface deposition rate of dust (dry mass) due to wet processes

Name: sltovgyre
Title: Northward Ocean Salt Transport Due to Gyre
Description: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

Name: jno2
Title: Photolysis Rate of NO2
Description: Photolysis rate of nitrogen dioxide (NO2)

Name: dgw
Title: Change in Groundwater
Description: Groundwater is subsurface water below the depth of the water table.

Name: cStem
Title: Carbon Mass in Stem
Description: including sapwood and hardwood.

Name: loadbc
Title: Load of Black Carbon Aerosol
Description: The total dry mass of black carbon aerosol particles per unit area.

Name: rsutcsafbnd
Title: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Shortwave Radiation in Bands
Description: Calculated in the absence of aerosols and clouds, following Ghan (2013, ACP). This requires a double-call in the radiation code with precisely the same meteorology.

Name: c13Veg
Title: Mass of 13C in Vegetation
Description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in vegetation (any living plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass).

Name: orogIs
Title: Ice Sheet Surface Altitude
Description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. Altitude is the (geometric) height above the geoid, which is the reference geopotential surface. The geoid is similar to mean sea level.

Name: wsgmax10m
Title: Maximum Wind Speed of Gust at 10m
Description: Wind speed gust maximum at 10m above surface

Name: sistrxdtop
Title: X-Component of Atmospheric Stress on Sea Ice
Description: X-component of atmospheric stress on sea ice

Name: e90inst
Title: Volume mixing ratio of Artificial tracer with 90 day lifetime
Justification for inclusion: To compare differences in atmospheric transport in different models

Name: pan
Title: PAN Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Name: pbsi
Title: Biogenic Silicon Production
Description: 'Mole concentration' means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction mole\_concentration\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox\_expressed\_as\_nitrogen'. The specification of a physical process by the phrase due\_to\_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity  named by omitting the phrase.  "tendency\_of\_X" means derivative of X with respect to time.

Name: fco2antt
Title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to All Anthropogenic Emissions of CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: This is requested only for the emission-driven coupled carbon climate model runs.  Does not include natural fire sources but, includes all anthropogenic sources, including fossil fuel use, cement production, agricultural burning, and sources associated with anthropogenic land use change excluding forest regrowth.

Name: intuadse
Title: Vertically Integrated Eastward Dry Statice Energy Transport
