Justification for inclusion: Requested to study impacts on aviation. Needed to diagnose clear air turbulence.

Name: siconca
Title: Sea-Ice Area Percentage (Atmospheric Grid)
Description: Percentage of grid cell covered by sea ice

Name: cLitterAbove
Title: Carbon Mass in Above-Ground Litter
Description: "Litter" is dead plant material in or above the soil. It is distinct from coarse wood debris. The precise distinction between "fine" and "coarse" is model dependent. "Surface litter" means the part of the litter resting above the soil surface. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. The sum of the quantities with standard names surface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon and subsurface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon has the standard name litter\_mass\_content\_of\_carbon.

Name: depthl
Title: depth of lake below the surface
Justification for inclusion: studying the impact of lakes in climate model simulations necessitates documentation of details of the implementation of lakes

Name: fNVegSoil
Title: Total Nitrogen Mass Flux from Vegetation Directly to Soil
Description: In some models part of nitrogen (e.g., root exudate) can go directly into the soil pool without entering litter.

Name: ppcalc
Title: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Calcareous Phytoplankton
Description: Primary (organic carbon) production by the calcite-producing phytoplankton component alone

Name: dsw
Title: Change in Surface Water Storage
Description: The phrase "land\_water\_amount", often known as "Terrestrial Water Storage", includes: surface liquid water (water in rivers, wetlands, lakes, reservoirs, rainfall intercepted by the canopy); surface ice and snow (glaciers, ice caps, grounded ice sheets not displacing sea water, river and lake ice, other surface ice such as frozen flood water, snow lying on the surface and intercepted by the canopy); subsurface water (liquid and frozen soil water, groundwater).

Name: pr18O
Title: Precipitation Flux of Water Containing Oxygen-18 (H2 18O)
Description: Precipitation mass flux of water molecules that contain the oxygen-18 isotope (H2 18O), including solid and liquid phases.

Name: ttop
Title: Air Temperature at Cloud Top
Description: cloud\_top refers to the top of the highest cloud. Air temperature is the bulk temperature of the air, not the surface (skin) temperature.

Name: umo
Title: Ocean Mass X Transport
Description: X-ward mass transport from resolved and parameterized advective transport.

Name: intpoc
Title: Particulate Organic Carbon Content
Description: Vertically integrated POC

Name: limirrdiaz
Title: Irradiance Limitation of Diazotrophs
Description: Growth limitation of diazotrophs due to solar irradiance. "Growth limitation due to solar irradiance" means the ratio of the growth rate of a species population in the environment (where the amount of sunlight reaching a location may be limited) to the theoretical growth rate if there were no such limit on solar irradiance.

Name: tauv
Title: Surface Downward Northward Wind Stress
Description: Downward northward wind stress at the surface

Name: zmiscos
Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Other Zooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Description: carbon from additional zooplankton component concentrations alone (e.g. Micro, meso).  Since the models all have different numbers of components, this variable has been included to provide a check for intercomparison between models since some phytoplankton groups are supersets.

Name: remoc
Title: Remineralization of Organic Carbon
Description: Remineralization is the degradation of organic matter into inorganic forms of carbon, nitrogen, phosphorus and other micronutrients, which consumes oxygen and releases energy.

Name: hussLut
Title: Near-Surface Specific Humidity on Land-Use Tile
Description: Normally, the specific humidity should be reported at the 2 meter height

Name: es
Title: Bare Soil Evaporation
Description: Water here means water in all phases. Evaporation is the conversion of liquid or solid into vapor. (The conversion of solid alone into vapor is called "sublimation".) In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.

Name: eminh3
Title: Total Emission Rate of NH3
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

Name: expcalcob
Title: Sinking Flux of Calcite Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Justification for inclusion: Calcite is the dominant form of calcium carbonate in marine sediments, and as such, the sinking flux of calcite reaching the ocean bottom is essential for understanding the ocean sediment response to climate change and ocean acidification.

Name: cSoil
Title: Carbon Mass in Model Soil Pool
Description: Carbon mass in the full depth of the soil model.

Name: difmxybo
Title: Ocean Momentum XY Biharmonic Diffusivity
Description: Lateral biharmonic viscosity applied to the momentum equations.

Name: rlut
Title: TOA Outgoing Longwave Radiation
Description: at the top of the atmosphere (to be compared with satellite measurements)

Name: loadno3
Title: Load of NO3
Description: The total dry mass of nitrate aerosol particles per unit area.

Name: co3abioos
Title: Surface Abiotic Carbonate Ion Concentration
Description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the abiotic-analogue carbonate anion (CO3). An abiotic analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable when biological effects on ocean carbon concentration and alkalinity are ignored.

Name: rsuscsbnd
Title: Surface Upwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation for Each Band
Description: Calculated with aerosols but without clouds. This is a standard clear-sky calculation

Name: dsn
Title: Change in Snow Water Equivalent
Description: Change in time of the mass per unit area of ice in glaciers, ice caps, ice sheets and shelves, river and lake ice, any other ice on a land surface, such as frozen flood water, and snow lying on such ice or on the land surface.

Name: fbddtdife
Title: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Iron Due to Biological Activity
Description: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of dissolved inorganic iron

Name: osaltrmadvect
Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
Description: The phrase "residual mean advection" refers to the sum of the model's resolved advective transport plus any parameterized advective transport. Parameterized advective transport includes processes such as parameterized mesoscale and submesoscale transport, as well as any other advectively parameterized transport. When the parameterized advective transport is represented in the model as a skew-diffusion rather than an advection, then the parameterized skew diffusion should be included in this diagnostic, since the convergence of skew-fluxes are identical (in the continuous formulation) to the convergence of advective fluxes.

Name: rsutcs4co2
Title: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation 4XCO2 Atmosphere
Description: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation calculated using carbon dioxide concentrations increased fourfold

Name: limnmisc
Title: Nitrogen Limitation of Other Phytoplankton
Description: Phytoplankton are algae that grow where there is sufficient light to support photosynthesis. "Miscellaneous phytoplankton" are all those phytoplankton that are not diatoms, diazotrophs, calcareous phytoplankton, picophytoplankton or other separately named components of the phytoplankton population. "Nitrogen growth limitation" means the ratio of the growth rate of a species population in the environment (where there is a finite availability of nitrogen) to the theoretical growth rate if there were no such limit on nitrogen availability.

Name: wetbc
Title: Wet Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass
Description: Surface deposition rate of black carbon (dry mass) due to wet processes

Name: opottemppsmadvect
Title: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized submesoscale eddy advection. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

Name: simprefrozen
Title: Thickness of Refrozen Ice on Melt Pond
Description: Volume of refrozen ice on melt ponds divided by meltpond covered area

Name: areacellg
Title: Grid-Cell Area for Ice Sheet Variables
Description: Area of the target grid (not the interpolated area of the source grid).
